title: Cult arrests, Slender Man guilty plea & submarine murder mystery
itunes:title: Cult arrests, Slender Man guilty plea & submarine murder mystery
description:
Members of a paramilitary "Christian" sect are jailed on child abuse and sex charges in New Mexico. Reporter Patty Lane and psychologist Caryn Stark discuss revelations in the case with Nancy Grace. A 15-year-old girl entered a guilty plea to trying to stab a 12-year-old girl to death to please the fictional "Slender Man" character. Stark and reporter Drew Nelson talk to Nancy about the bizarre case. Lawyer Brian Claypool, forensic psychiatrist Dr. Daniel Bober and reporter Cheryl White join Nancy to look at the story of a female journalist whose body was allegedly dumped from a submarine while on a short cruise with a Danish inventor.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
